problem.markdown: A system contains an ideal gas, and is at rest. It expands isothermally. In the process, all heat absorbed is converted into work. Which of the following statements are true? [ ] The process violates the Kelvin-Planck statement of the Second Law. [x] This process will satisfy the First Law. [x] The Kelvin-Planck statement is not applicable in this case because the process is not a cyclic process.
problem.p: A system contains an ideal gas, and is at rest. It expands isothermally. In the process, all heat absorbed is converted into work. Which of the following statements are true?
